publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-466 Alasdair Morgan: Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates the Manx Government, the Tynwald and all other Isle of Man services on the speedy and efficient way in which they have dealt with the aftermath of the tragic loss of the Solway Harvester and commends the generosity of the Tynwald in its decision to fund the recovery of the vessel.
S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Alex Fergusson*, Michael Russell*

S1M-466 Alasdair Morgan: Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates the Manx Government, the Tynwald and all other Isle of Man services on the speedy and efficient way in which they have dealt with the aftermath of the tragic loss of the Solway Harvester and commends the generosity of the Tynwald in its decision to fund the recovery of the vessel. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Michael Russell, David Mundell*
S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Fiona McLeod*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Alex Salmond*
S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Fiona Hyslop*

S1M-466 Alasdair Morgan: Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament—That the Parliament congratulates the Manx Government, the Tynwald and all other Isle of Man services on the speedy and efficient way in which they have dealt with the aftermath of the tragic loss of the Solway Harvester and commends the generosity of the Tynwald in its decision to fund the recovery of the vessel. Supported by: Alex Fergusson, Michael Russell, David Mundell, Fiona McLeod, Dr Elaine Murray, Tricia Marwick, Mr Alex Salmond, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr David Davidson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona Hyslop, Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-466 Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament (lodged on 26 January 2000) Richard Lochhead*, Christine Grahame*

S1M-466 Alasdair Morgan: Raising of the Solway Harvester by the Manx Parliament-That the Parliament congratulates the Manx Government, the Tynwald and all other Isle of Man services on the speedy and efficient way in which they have dealt with the aftermath of the tragic loss of the Solway Harvester and commends the generosity of the Tynwald in its decision to fund the recovery of the vessel.
